syntax.description: Draw one square in a cell, two parameters needed. Parameters 'x' and 'y' define the position of the cell. Optional parameter 'color' defines the color of the element. For further information, see 'position and color'.

Draw one circle in a cell, two parameters needed. Parameters 'x' and 'y' define the position of the cell. Optional parameter 'color' defines the color of the element. For further information, see 'position and color'.

Draw one line in a cell, four parameters needed. Parameters 'x' and 'y' define the position of the cell. Parameters 'from' and 'to' define the position of where the line should start and end in the cell, see 'extra definitions'. Optional parameter 'color' defines the color of the element. For further information, see 'position and color'.

Draw one triangle in a cell, five parameters needed. Parameters 'x' and 'y' define the position of the cell. Parameters 'a', 'b' and 'c' define the three corner points of your triangle in the cell, see 'extra definitions'. Optional parameter 'color' defines the color of the element. For further information, see 'position and color'.

Draw a rectangle over multiple cells, four parameters needed. Parameters 'x' and 'y' define the position of the beginning cell. Parameters 'width' and 'height' are measured in the number of cells. Optional parameter 'color' defines the color of the element. For further information, see 'color'.
Clear one cell, two parameters needed. Parameters 'x' and 'y' define the position of the cell. For further information, see 'position'.
